TyrionLannister.name: Tyrion Lannister
TyrionLannister.question: Is Tyrion Lannister guilty of being a dwarf?
TyrionLannister.description: How does being a member of House Lannister affect his chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
TyrionLannister.quote: I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.

CerseiLannister.name: Cersei Lannister
CerseiLannister.question: Will Cersei Lannister die at the hands of the valonqar?
CerseiLannister.description: How does being a member of House Lannister affect her chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
CerseiLannister.quote: When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die.

AryaStark.name: Arya Stark
AryaStark.question: What will Arya Stark say to the God of Death?
AryaStark.description: How does being a member of House Stark affect her chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
AryaStark.quote: A girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell. And I'm going home.

JaimeLannister.name: Jaime Lannister
JaimeLannister.question: Is Jaime Lannister going to pay for his sins?
JaimeLannister.description: How does being a member of House Lannister affect his chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
JaimeLannister.quote: Then he... turned to his pyromancer. Burn them all, he said. Burn them in their homes, burn them in their beds.

JonSnow.name: Jon Snow
JonSnow.question: Is Jon Snow the prince who was promised?
JonSnow.description: How does being a member of House Stark affect his chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
JonSnow.quote: You are a Stark. You may not have my name, but you have my blood.

SandorClegane.name: Sandor Clegane
SandorClegane.question: Has Sandor Clegane had his last chicken?
SandorClegane.description: How does being a man affect his chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
SandorClegane.quote: Killing is the sweetest thing there is

SansaStark.name: Sansa Stark
SansaStark.question: Will Sansa Stark meet her fate?
SansaStark.description: How does being a member of House Stark affect her chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
SansaStark.quote: When the snows fall and the white winds blow, the lone wolf dies, but the pack survives.

DaenerysTargaryen.name: Daenerys Targaryen
DaenerysTargaryen.question: Will Daenerys Targaryen sit on the Iron Throne?
DaenerysTargaryen.description: How does being a member of House Targaryen affect her chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?

BranStark.name: Bran Stark
BranStark.question: Can the Three-Eyed Raven affect the course of war?
BranStark.description: How does being a member of House Stark affect his chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
BranStark.quote: I remember what it felt like to be Brandon Stark, but I remember so much else now.

Qyburn.name: Qyburn
Qyburn.question: Will Qyburn pay for his experiments?
Qyburn.description: How does his allegiance to House Lannister affect his chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
Qyburn.quote: The Citadel stripped me of it. They found some of my... experiments... too bold.

Varys.name: Varys
Varys.question: Will the Master of Whisperers escape death?
Varys.description: Do noblewomen have a harder time surviving in Westeros?
Varys.quote: Storms come and go, the big fish eat the little fish, and I keep on paddling.

TheonGreyjoy.name: Theon Greyjoy
TheonGreyjoy.question: Will Theon Greyjoy atone for his sins?
TheonGreyjoy.description: How does being a member of House Greyjoy affect his chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
TheonGreyjoy.quote: It always seemed that there was an impossible choice I had to make. Stark or Greyjoy.

EuronGreyjoy.name: Euron Greyjoy
EuronGreyjoy.question: Will Euron Greyjoy sail to certain death?
EuronGreyjoy.description: How does being a member of House Greyjoy affect his chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
EuronGreyjoy.quote: I don't mock the Drowned God - I am the Drowned God.

Bronn.name: Bronn
Bronn.question: Will Bronn get his castle in the end?
Bronn.description: How does his allegiance to House Lannister affect his chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
Bronn.quote: You waste time trying to get people to love you. You'll end up the most popular dead man in town.

JorahMormont.name: Jorah Mormont
JorahMormont.question: Can Jorah Mormont prove his love for his Khaleesi?
JorahMormont.description: Do noblewomen have a harder time surviving in Westeros?
JorahMormont.quote: There is a beast in every man, and it stirs when you put a sword in his hand.

GregorClegane.name: Gregor Clegane
GregorClegane.question: Is the mountain strong enough to survive?
GregorClegane.description: Do noblewomen have a harder time surviving in Westeros?
GregorClegane.quote: Elia of Dorne. I killed her screaming whelp.

DavosSeaworth.name: Davos Seaworth
DavosSeaworth.question: Are Davos Seasworth's smugglers days over for good?
DavosSeaworth.description: Do noblewomen have a harder time surviving in Westeros?
DavosSeaworth.quote: If we don't put aside our enmities and band together, we will die.

Melisandre.name: Melisandre
Melisandre.question: Will Melisandre outlive even the Great War?
Melisandre.description: Do noblewomen have a harder time surviving in Westeros?
Melisandre.quote: The night is dark and full of terrors, old man, but the fire burns them all away.

GreyWorm.name: Grey Worm
GreyWorm.question: Will Grey Worm serve his queen to the end of his days?
GreyWorm.description: How does his allegiance to House Targaryen affect his chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
GreyWorm.quote: I was never the biggest, I was never the strongest, but I was bravest, always.

BrienneOfTarth.name: Brienne of Tarth
BrienneOfTarth.question: Will Brienne of Tarth meet her fate?
BrienneOfTarth.description: Do noblewomen have a harder time surviving in Westeros?
BrienneOfTarth.quote: All my life men like you have sneered at me. And all my life I've been knocking men like you into the dust.
